title: Set Dilkhush founder photo assets to Photo #1

requirements.summary: Replace the Dilkhush founder photo assets so all UI locations using the Dilkhush image constants display Photo #1.
acceptanceCriteria: In the "Meet the Owners" section, the Dilkhush card displays Photo #1 (car seated, black shirt).
The header avatar and About section Dilkhush photo also show the same updated Photo #1 (since they use the same Dilkhush image constants).
No backend changes are required to load the image; it is served as a static asset from frontend/public/assets/generated/.

file_operations.description: Replace this static asset with Photo #1 (car seated, black shirt) so all usages of the 512px Dilkhush founder image update automatically.
Replace this static asset with Photo #1 (car seated, black shirt) so all usages of the 128px Dilkhush founder image update automatically (e.g., header avatar).
